hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo hi this is to test sonar source /opt/builder/.bash_profile export SONAR_SCANNER_OPTS="-Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m" cd /opt/build/src/razor_dapgathererfeature/gatherer/dap/platform/build_scripts/ source /opt/build/src/razor_dapgathererfeature/gatherer/dap/platform/build_scripts/build.conf p4 sync -f /opt/build/src/razor_dapgathererfeature/gatherer/dap/platform/build_scripts/... sh -x /opt/build/src/razor_dapgathererfeature/gatherer/dap/platform/build_scripts/commongathererbuild.sh build ${CHANGELIST}

hudson.plugins.sonar.SonarRunnerBuilder.properties: sonar.projectKey=my:AimFeature sonar.projectName=AimFeature sonar.scm.disabled=false sonar.projectVersion=1.0.0 sonar.perforce.port=192.168.210.178:16060 sonar.perforce.username=builder sonar.perforce.password.secured=h@ndsFr33 sonar.perforce.clientName=blr-dap-101.builder.dapgathererfeature sonar.sources=aim/jsonvo,aim/chrome-extension,aim/executor,aim/dist,aim/gatherer,aim/inline,aim/model,aim/utils,aim/conf sonar.java.binaries=aim/target/classes sonar.jacoco.reportPath=aim/target/jacoco.exec sonar.dynamicAnalysis=reuseReports sonar.java.coveragePlugin=jacoco sonar.jacoco.reportMissing.force.zero=true

sonar.projectKey=my:FrameworkFeature sonar.projectName=FrameworkFeature sonar.scm.disabled=false sonar.scm-stats.enabled=true sonar.projectVersion=1.0.0 sonar.perforce.port=192.168.210.178:16060 sonar.perforce.username=builder sonar.perforce.password.secured=h@ndsFr33 sonar.scm.url=scm:perforce:http://192.168.210.178:16060://gatherer/dap/platform/framework sonar.perforce.clientName=blr-dap-101.builder.dapgathererfeature sonar.sources=framework/chrome-extension,framework/cortex,framework/model,framework/browser-manager,framework/crypto,framework/framework,framework/gatherer-api,framework/gatherer-interfaces,framework/jsonvo,framework/logger,framework/money-parser,framework/refresh-engine,framework/util
